sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's Seventh Congressional District,  it is my honor to congratulate Avi Bender for this impressive  accomplishment and wish Avi all the best for this upcoming year in  Germany.
title: Recognizing Avi Bender

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's Seventh Congressional District,  it is my honor to thank Annette Stolba for her four decades of service  to the citizens of Chaffee County.
title: Recognizing Annette Stolba

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's Seventh Congressional District,  it is my honor to congratulate John Curtis on his promotion to Chief of  South Metro Fire Rescue.
title: Recognizing John Curtis

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to thank Dr.
title: Recognizing Dr. Angela ``angie'' Paccione

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to congratulate Tom Downey for his awards and thank him for  his contributions to our community.
title: Recognizing Tom Downey

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to congratulate this school, staff, administration, and  board members for this accomplishment and thank them for their  commitment to our kids and our community.
title: Recognizing Canon City High School

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's Seventh Congressional District,  it is my honor to congratulate the Conifer Area of Commerce for 50  years of service and thank them for their contribution to our  community.

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's Seventh Congressional District,  it is my honor to congratulate Elevation Beer Company for this  accomplishment.

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's Seventh Congressional District,  I am honored to congratulate Chief Bob Baker on his retirement.
title: Recognizing Chief Bob Baker

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado and the United States Congress, I  extend profound gratitude to Major General Laura Clellan for her  remarkable service.
title: Recognizing Major General Laura Clellan

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's Seventh Congressional District,  it is my honor to congratulate Alex Willis for his win at the 2025  Winter Triathlon National Championships, and join his friends and  family in rooting for his success at the World Championships.
title: Recognizing Alex Willis

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's Seventh Congressional District,  it is my honor to congratulate Emiko Mukai for this impressive  accomplishment and wish Emiko all the best in this upcoming year in  Germany.
title: Recognizing Emiko Mukai

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to congratulate Foothills Regional Housing on their 50th  anniversary and thank them for all they do for our community.
title: Recognizing Foothills Regional Housing

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's Seventh Congressional District,  it is my honor to congratulate Dr.
title: Recognizing Dr. Kiara Kuenzler

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to thank President Buchanan for his hard work and  dedication to serving his country and his community.
title: Recognizing Morgan Jay Buchanan
